Welcome to the Chat SDK Web! Here you can test the latest version of our powerful real-time chat client.

Login using your email and password or your social account!

If you'd like to help us to beta test the app, start by creating an account at sdk.chat then send us an email at team@sdk.chat letting us know the domain of your website and we'll get back to you with instructions on how to start testing Chat SDK.

If you find any bugs or have any suggestions let us know at team@sdk.chat.
